pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extreme Value Analysis with Goodness-of-Fit Testing // Goodness- of-fit tests for selection of r in the r-largest order statistics (GEVr) model. Goodness-of-fit tests for threshold selection in the peaks-over-threshold approach. Random number generation and density functions for the GEVr distribution. Profile likelihood for return level estimation using the GEVr and generalized pareto distributions. P-value adjustments for sequential, multiple testing error control.
